Class Reports_Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller.Reports_Controller

javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Reports_Controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the reports page.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize method sets the comboBox for contacts and the users current ZonedID. The current local time and date is set to users current Zone ID and current time and date.
      Specified by:

    • findContactSchedule

      public void findContactSchedule(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The findContactSchedule method sets the scheduleTable to the selected contacts schedule. The tableview is set depending on the contact combobox's setting.

      actionEvent -

    • totalByTypeAction

      public void totalByTypeAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException

    • checkForApts

      public void checkForApts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The checkForApts sets the tableview with the number of appointments for the current day. The number of appointments for the current day are presented along with the current day and the tableview is populated with the information for those appointments.
